About Me

I'm a motivated Computer Science undergraduate from Mahipalpur, New Delhi, with a deep passion for networking technologies and network infrastructure. While I've built strong foundations in full-stack development and machine learning, my true calling lies in the world of network engineering.

Currently working as a Junior Software Developer at Mobilise App Pvt. Ltd. (Aug 2025 - Present), I'm actively building my networking expertise while applying my development skills to create robust solutions. Previously, I interned at THDC India Limited where I developed a secure MERN-based Job & Internship Portal, enabling 100+ students to explore 50+ verified opportunities.

My journey into networking is driven by fascination with how data flows across the internet, how networks are designed for scalability and security, and how infrastructure powers our connected world. I'm actively learning network protocols, routing & switching, and network security to transition into a full-time networking role.

When I'm not studying networking concepts or coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, working on networking labs, and staying updated with the latest trends in network infrastructure and cybersecurity.
